views.markdown:
Shared Library for Watusi, Stalky, OnlineNotify and other tweaks made by Fouad Raheb

This is a developer support library. No icons are installed.

Bug fixes & improvements Supports unc0ver 2.2.0

- Since license purchase is now made from my server, I removed PayPal and Twitter SDKs which redured the package size by 11mb.
- Finally fully removed GoogleAnalytics, which should reduce the number of weird crashes.
